shortdesc.ph: Retrieves the audio data after mixing the captured and playback audio.
Retrieves the data after audio mixing of capture and playback.
Retrieves the data after mixing recorded and playback audio.
Retrieves the audio data after mixing captured and playback audio.

p.codeblock: final void Function(String channelId, AudioFrame audioFrame)? onMixedAudioFrame;

section.p: To ensure that the format of the mixed audio data from capture and playback meets expectations, you can set the audio data format using the following method: After calling to set the audio data format, call to register the audio observer object. The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the parameters in this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

To ensure that the audio data format after capture and playback mixing meets expectations, you can set the audio data format using the following methods: call to set the audio data format, then call to register the audio observer object. The SDK will calculate the sampling interval based on the parameters in this method and trigger the callback accordingly.

To ensure the format of the mixed audio data from recording and playback meets expectations, you can set the audio data format using the following methods: Call to set the audio data format, then call to register the audio frame observer object. The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the parameters of this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

To ensure the format of the audio data after mixing capture and playback meets expectations, you can call to set the audio data format, and then call to register the audio frame observer. The SDK calculates the sampling interval based on the parameters of this method and triggers the callback accordingly.

ul.li: Due to framework limitations, this callback does not support sending the processed audio data back to the SDK.
